Verses: 1  naan Apposthalanallavaa? Naan Suyaadheenanallavaa? Nammudaiya Karththaraagiyaiyesukiristhuvai Naan Dharisikkavillaiyaa? Karththarukkul Neengal En Kiriyaiyaayirukkireergalallavaa?
2  naan Matravargalukku Apposthalanaayiraavittaalum, Ungalukkallavo Apposthalanaayirukkiren, Karththarukkul Neengal En Apposthala Oozhiyaththirku Muththiraiyaayirukkireergale.
3  ennai Niyaayam Visaarikkiravargalukku Naan Sollugira Maaruththaramaavadhu:
4  pusikkavum Kudikkavum Engalukku Adhigaaramillaiyaa?
5  matra Apposthalarum, Karththarudaiya Sagodhararum, Kebaavum Seygiradhupola, Manaiviyaagiya Oru Sagodhariyaik Koottikkondu Thiriya Engalukkum Adhikaaramillaiyaa?
6  alladhu, Kaiththozhil Seyyaadhirukkiradharku Enakkum Barnabaavukkummaaththirandhaanaa Adhigaaramillai?

7  evan Than Sondhappanaththai Selavazhiththu, Thandile Sevagampannuvaan? Evan Thiraatchaththottaththai Undaakki, Adhin Kaniyil Pusiyaadhiruppaan? Evan Mandhaiyai Meyththu Adhin Paalai Saappidaadhiruppaan?
8  ivaigalai Manushar Vazhakkaththinpadi Sollugireno? Niyaayappiramaanamum Ivaigalai Sollugiradhillaiyaa?
9  poradikkira Maattai Vaai Kattaayaaga Endru Moseyin Piramaanaththile Ezhudhiyirukkiradhe. Dhevan Maadugalukkaagave Kavalaiyaayirukkiraaro?

10  namakkaagaththaan Idhai Sollugiraaro? Uzhugiravan Nambikkaiyode Uzhavum, Poradikkiravan Thaan Nambugiradhil Pangadaiven Engira Nambikkaiyode Poradikkavum Vendiyadhe, Aagaiyaal, Adhu Namakkaagave Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
11  naangal Ungalukku Gnaanananmaigalai Vidhaiththirukka, Ungal Sareerananmaigalai Aruththaal Adhu Periya Kaariyamaa?

12  matravargal Ungalidaththile Indha Adhikaaraththaich Seluththinaal, Avargalilum Naangal Adhigamaaich Seluththalaamallavaa? Appadiyirundhum, Kiristhuvin Suviseshaththirku Yaadhoru Thadaiyum Undaakaadhapadikku, Naangal Indha Adhikaaraththai Seluththaamal Ellaap Paadum Padugirom.

13  aasaariya Oozhiyanjeygiravargal Devaalayaththirkuriyavaigalil Pusikkiraargalendrum, Balipeedaththai Aduththup Panividai Seygiravargalukkup Balibeedaththilullavaigalil Pangu Undendrum Ariyeergalaa?
14  andhappadiye Suviseshaththai Arivikkiravargalukku Suviseshaththinaale Pizhaippu Undaagavendumendru Karththarum Kattalaiyittirukkiraar.

15  appadiyirundhum, Naan Ivaigalilondraiyum Anubavikkavillai; Ippadi Enakku Nadakkavendumendru Ivaigalai Naan Ezhudhugiradhumillai. En Menmaipaaraattalai Oruvan Avaththamaakkugiradhaippaarkkilum Saagiradhu Enakku Nalamaayirukkum.
16  suviseshaththai Naan Pirasangiththuvandhum, Menmaipaaraatta Enakku Idamillai; Adhu Enmel Vizhundha Kadamaiyaayirukkiradhu; Suviseshaththai Naan Pirasangiyaadhirundhaal, Enakku Aiyo.
17  naan Urchaagamaai Appadi Seydhaal Enakku Balan Undu; Urchaagamillaadhavanaai Seydhaalum, Ukkiraana Uththiyogam Enakku Oppuvikkappattirukkiradhe.

18  aadhalaal Enakku Balan Enna? Naan Suviseshaththaip Pirasangikkaiyil Adhaippatri Enakku Undaayirukkira Adhigaaraththai Mutrilum Seluththaamal, Kiristhuvin Suviseshaththai Selavillaamal Sthaapippadhe Enakku Balan.
19  naan Oruvarukkum Adimaippadaadhavanaayirundhum, Naan Adhiga Janangalai Aadhaayappaduththikkollumpadikku, Ennaiththaane Ellaarukkum Adimaiyaakkinen.

20  yoodharai Aadhaayappaduththikkollumpadikku Yoodharukku Yoodhanaippolavum, Niyaayappiramaanaththukkuk Keezhppattavargalai Aadhaayappaduththikkollumpadikku Niyaayappiramaanaththukkuk Keezhppattavanaip Polavumaanen.

21  niyaayappiramaanamillaadhavargalai Aadhaayappaduththikkollumpadikku Avargalukku Niyaayappiramaanam Illaadhavanaip Polavumaanen. Appadiyirundhum, Naan Dhevanukkumunbaaga Niyaayappiramaanamillaadhavanaayiraamal, Kiristhuvin Piramaanaththukkullaanavanaayirukkiren.
22  balaveenarai Aadhaayappaduththikkollumpadikkup Balaveenarukkup Balaveenanaippolaanen; Eppadiyaagilum Silarai Ratchikkumpadikku Naan Ellaarukkum Ellaamaanen.
23  suviseshaththil Naan Udanpangaaliyaagumpadikku, Adhinimiththame Ippadiseygiren.
24  pandhaya Saalaiyil Odugiravargalellaarum Oduvaargal; Aagilum, Oruvane Pandhayaththaip Peruvaanendru Ariyeergalaa? Neengal Petrukkollaththakkadhaaga Odungal.

25  pandhayaththirkup Poraadugira Yaavarum Ellaavatrileyum Itchaiyadakkamaayiruppaargal. Avargal Azhivulla Kireedaththaip Perumpadikku Appadi Seygiraargal, Naamo Azhivillaadha Kireedaththaip Perumpadikku Appadi Seygirom.
26  aadhalaal Naan Nichchayamillaadhavanaaga Oden; Aagaayaththai Adikkiravanaaga Silambampannen.
27  matravargalukkup Pirasangampannugira Naandhaane Aagaadhavanaaip Pogaadhapadikku, En Sareeraththai Odukkik Keezhppaduththugiren.
